name: Yogamatters Sticky Yoga Mat
description:
Our best-selling yoga mat, the Sticky Mat has been a collection favourite for over a decade and with good reason. The quality and durability is exceptional, that’s why you will see our Sticky Mat in yoga studios all around the world. Features great cushioning and available in a wide range of colours so that you can colour match your studio or home practice space to reflect your individuality.
Our Sticky Yoga Mat is the perfect yoga mat for beginners, yoga teachers and yoga studios.
Designed to pair with props from The Yogamatters Colours Collection.

A studio favourite - trusted by Yoga Studios and Teachers worldwide
Extremely durable and long-lasting
Wears in after use to develop excellent grip
Lightweight and easily transportable
4.5mm cushioning to protect knees and joints
Offered in a wide range of colours
Non-toxic and safe - our mats are 6-P Free (Phthalates, AZO, DOP, Phenol, Heavy Metals)
Standard 100 by OEKO-TEX® certified
Suitable for eyeletting, hang the mat on a wall bracket - ideal for studios!

The Sticky Mat is also included in our Yogamatters Beginners Starter Yoga Kit
The initial grip of this mat improves with every use; developing excellent and durable grip. We recommend cleaning this mat before use.

name: Yogamatters Eco Flow Yoga Mat
description:
Meet the Eco Flow Yoga Mat with unrivalled grip and strong eco credentials. 
The Eco Flow Yoga Mat supports your practice with a smooth surface that doesn't compromise on grip. The more you sweat the harder this mat works to keep you flowing. 
Made in Spain from sustainably harvested natural tree rubber, free from toxic chemicals and dyes, and produced with the highest respect for legal environmental and labour standards, this mat is perfect for the eco-conscious yogi.

made from 100% sustainably harvested natural tree rubber
superior grip with smooth finish
certified OEKO-TEX Standard 100, made with the highest respect for legal environmental and labour standards
recyclable & biodegradable
free from toxic chemicals and dyes
fresh and natural colours inspired from nature
made in Spain

To complete your kit, shop our other eco-friendly props here.
The Eco Flow Yoga mat may have initially a rubber smell, but this smell will fade over a short period of time. Due to the natural properties of this product, the colour may change a little over time. 
Store your mat rolled up. Do not leave exposed to direct sunlight or roll mat when still wet. Do not machine wash, submerge in water or use any soap or other chemicals to clean.
This product is not suitable for people with a rubber allergy.

name: Yogamatters Eco Everyday Yoga Mat
description:
Our best-selling eco-friendly yoga mat, the ‘Eco Everyday’ is made from natural tree rubber which has been sustainably harvested. Designed with a wave-like textured surface for unrivalled grip and cushioned to give comfort to knees and joints, our ‘Eco Everyday’ is the perfect yoga mat for your daily practice. 

Made from sustainably harvested natural tree rubber and recycled materials certified by Recycled Claim Standard (RCS), an innovative solution to environmental waste
Biodegradable
4mm thickness offering support and cushioning for knees and joints
A textured practice surface for superior grip 
Free from toxic chemicals and dyes

Due to the natural properties of this product, the colour of this mat may change a little over time.  The mat initially has a strong rubber smell, this smell will fade over a short period of time.  Store your mat rolled up. Do not leave exposed to direct sunlight or roll mat when still wet. Do not machine wash, submerge in water or use any soap or other chemicals to clean.
As this mat is made from natural rubber 99% latex free, this product is not suitable for anyone with a rubber allergy.

name: Yogamatters Aqua Evolve Yoga Mat
description:
Sustainability innovation at its best - a yoga mat that actually helps to clean the environment!
The Yogamatters Aqua Evolve yoga mat is made from a unique combination of EVA foam and algae from lakes and ponds. 
Algae blooms pose a major problem for communities around the world causing eco-systems to become out of balance. They are caused by factors such as climate change, water pollution from agriculture, industry and society.
Our partners at BLOOM have found an innovative way of helping the environment by turning algae blooms into eco-foams for use in products. 
During algae harvesting, the algae is separated from the water and the clean, filtered and oxygenated water is returned back into the environment. Helping to restore the eco-system. Algae also absorbs and traps CO2 from the atmosphere through the process of photosynthesis. When the algae is harvested, the CO2 comes along with it, which means cleaner air too!
For every mat, 64 litres of cleaned water are returned to the local habitat as well as 40 cubic metres of clean air. 

Uses reclaimed/recycled materials certified by the Global Recycling Standard (GRS) 
Eco-friendly
Vegan
Lightweight and portable at 750 grams
Free from latex, PVC, toxic chemicals and dyes
5mm thickness for super cushioning
Made in Spain

Please keep the mat out of direct sunlight and hot places. Store in a cool, dry place.

name: Yogamatters Eco Rise Yoga Mat
description:
Our top pick for an eco-friendly yoga mat with a stylish flair, the Yogamatters Eco Rise Yoga Mat, is made from natural materials and comes in a selection of soft colours. The unique cotton-blend mesh surface gives the ‘Eco Rise’ superior grip & durability.
Made from natural tree rubber which has been sustainably harvested, our earth-friendly yoga mat is the ideal place to start your day. 
Designed to match perfectly with props from the Organic Cotton Yoga Collection. 

Made from sustainably harvested natural tree rubber
Biodegradable
Free from toxic chemicals and dyes
Fresh and natural colours
Cotton blend mesh surface for strong grip
3mm thickness gives moderate cushioning. For more cushioning see Eco Everyday Yoga Mat

The Eco Everyday Rise Yoga Mat  initially has a strong rubber smell, this smell will fade over a short period of time.  
Due to the natural properties of this product, the colour may change a little over time.  
This product is not suitable for people with a rubber allergy (99% latex free)
The Eco Everyday Rise Yoga Mat is also part of the Yogamatters Beginners Eco Yoga Kit

name: Yogamatters Ultra Lightweight Exercise Mat - Black
description:
The Yogamatters Ultra Lightweight Mat is a lightweight multi-functional exercise mat that will take you from the gym to yoga and everywhere in between.  
Made from complete NBR foam and post-production materials,  the Ultra Lightweight is cushioned, lightweight and functional. And at 10mm thick, provides a soft but stable base to work out from and with a textured finish enhances grip in dry and wet conditions.
The Ultra is made with a closed cell structure and contains an antibacterial formula both components stopping bacteria from growing or odours developing. Finished with bevelled edges which blend into the floor so movement can seamlessly extend beyond the body of the mat.

A multipurpose mat
Closed cell structure
Contains a hygienic antibacterial formula
Contains post-production materials
Softly cushioned
Lightweight

name: Yogamatters Thrive PU Yoga Mat
description:
Designed to support your practice with purpose, the Yogamatters PU Yoga Mat offers exceptional grip, cushioning and stability so you can move with confidence from first sun salutation to final savasana.
Crafted with a high-performance PU (polyurethane) surface, this mat responds to heat and moisture, delivering a non-slip experience even in the sweatiest of sessions. At 4.5mm thick, it provides just the right balance of comfort and connection. It is soft enough to cushion joints, yet firm enough to keep you grounded through every pose.

Premium PU top layer for superior grip in all conditions
Natural rubber base for stability and support
Open-cell structure to absorb moisture and enhance traction
4.5mm thickness for enhanced comfort
Free from PVC and harmful chemicals


*PU yoga mats are naturally absorbent and may develop marks or stains with regular use. To maintain your mat’s quality, please follow the care instructions carefully. Please note Yogamatters Mat Cleaners are not suitable for cleaning the Thrive PU Mat. Avoid applying lotions or creams before practice, as they can cause buildup on the surface. Do not soak or fully submerge the mat in water.

name: Yogamatters Eco Cork Yoga Mat - Black
description:
The earth-friendly Eco Cork Yoga Mat is made from cork of Oak trees and natural rubber from sustainable rubber farms. At 4mm thick, the Eco Cork mat offers a smooth practice surface with excellent cushioning and comfort.
Cork bark is naturally anti-bacterial, eradicating germs and bacteria that cause bad odours, so you can breathe easy knowing that your cork yoga mat isn’t home to any nasties. The grip improves as you get into your practice and start to sweat, you can speed this up by spraying the mat with water before starting your practice. 

Vegan

Made from the cork of the cork Oak tree & sustainably harvested natural tree rubber
Recyclable & biodegradable
Free from toxic chemicals and dyes
Grip improves as you sweat, spritz mat with water to speed this up
4mm thickness offering good cushioning

 This product is not suitable for people with a rubber allergy (99% latex-free)
This mat may have initially a rubber smell, this smell will fade over a short period of time. 
Shop the full Yogamatters Eco Cork Collection here.

name: Yogamatters Eco Cork Yoga Mat - Green
description:
The earth-friendly Eco Cork Yoga Mat is made from cork of Oak trees and natural rubber from sustainable rubber farms. At 4mm thick, the Eco Cork mat offers a smooth practice surface with excellent cushioning and comfort.
Cork bark is naturally anti-bacterial, eradicating germs and bacteria that cause bad odours, so you can breathe easy knowing that your cork yoga mat isn’t home to any nasties. The grip improves as you get into your practice and start to sweat, you can speed this up by spraying the mat with water before starting your practice. 

Vegan

Made from the cork of the cork Oak tree & sustainably harvested natural tree rubber
Recyclable & biodegradable
Free from toxic chemicals and dyes
Grip improves as you sweat, spritz mat with water to speed this up
4mm thickness offering good cushioning

This mat may have initially a rubber smell, this smell will fade over a short period of time. 
Shop the full Yogamatters Eco Cork Collection here.

name: Yogamatters Signature Studio Yoga Mat
description:
Engineered for performance, the Yogamatters Signature Studio Yoga Mat with its unrivalled grip, incredible durability and easy to clean closed cell structure, makes this our top pick for yoga studios.
At 5.5mm thick, the ‘Studio’ mat is the perfect yoga mat for yoga studios, providing just the right amount of cushioning and comfort without compromising stability in your yoga pose. 
Designed to be reversible to accommodate different styles of yoga.  The smooth side is perfect for a gentle Hatha, Restorative or Yin practice and the dotted side provides a stable grip for a dynamic practice making it a versatile option for a yoga studio. 
Our Studio Yoga Mat is also available as a wholesale box ideal for yoga studios. Please have a look at our other colour matching props here.

Made in Germany
5.5mm thickness to protect knees and joints
Available in two lengths - Standard -183cm and Long - 210cm
Unrivalled dry grip from first use, no need to wear in
The closed cell structure prevents sweat, dirt and bacteria from penetrating the mat
Extremely durable and long lasting 
Reversible feature to suit your practice
Plastic-free packaging
Oeko-Tex® Standard 100 Certification*
Suitable for eyeletting which is an additional service on top of the cost of the mat, hang the mat on a wall bracket - ideal for studios!

* An international testing and certification system for textiles, limiting the use of certain chemicals which may be considered harmful for people and planet. Free of AZO, DOP, Phthalates, Latex, Bisphenol-A (BPA), Lead and Dioxins.

name: Yogamatters Wellness Pilates Mat
description:
Our most versatile mat is perfect for yoga, Pilates or a fitness class. At 8mm thick the Everyday Wellness Mat offers unparalleled cushioning and comfort for your joints whilst you practise. At less than 1.5kg, the Wellness Mat is also very lightweight making it easily transportable to your class. 
Engineered to have exceptional grip and designed to be reversible so you have your choice of colour and texture to practice on.

8mm thick offering extreme comfort and cushioning
Strong grip 
Ultra-lightweight
Very durable
A versatile mat for a range of fitness activities

*As this mat is lightweight, it will naturally curl at the ends when first used. As you begin to practise your mat will flatten out.

name: Yogamatters Eco Travel Yoga Mat
description:
Super light and ultra thin, our Eco Travel Yoga Mat folds easily into your backpack or carry-on luggage making it the ideal travel companion. 
Made from eco-friendly materials which have been sustainably harvested and engineered to have a non-slip surface, use the ‘Eco Travel’ on its own or as a hygienic layer on top of a studio mat.
Our Eco Travel Yoga Mat is also available as a wholesale box ideal for yoga studios, and it's also part of our Travel Yoga Kit.
Each mat is different with it’s own unique marbled design. 

Made from sustainably harvested natural tree rubber which offers superior grip
Biodegradable
Free from toxic chemicals and dyes
Super light at 750 grams 
Ultra thin at 1mm
Easily foldable 
Unique marbled design

Due to the natural properties of this product, the colour of this mat may change a little over time. The mat initally has a strong rubber smell, this smell will fade over a short period of time. Store your mat rolled up. Do not leave exposed to direct sunlight or roll mat when still wet. Do not machine wash, submerge in water or use any soap or other chemicals to clean.
 99% latex free, this product is not suitable for anyone with a rubber allergy.

name: Yogamatters Organic Cotton Yoga Mat
description:
Sustainability matters and here at Yogamatters we’ve been working hard to make your yoga favourites more eco-friendly!
Re-introducing our organic cotton yoga mat - now made from 100% organically grown cotton, this mat is ideal for your home yoga practice the traditional Indian way. The packaging is compostable now too!

Based on the traditional cotton yoga mat 
Made from 100% organically grown cotton with hand knotted tassels
Hand woven by Indian craftspeople
Doubles as a rug for your home
Use a spray water bottle for improved grip
Thoughtfully produced in India with a long-term Yogamatters partner 

Shop the Yogamatters Organic Cotton Collection here.

name: Manduka PROlite Yoga Mat
description:
The Manduka PROlite yoga mat is the perfect solution for people seeking a lightweight yoga mat with superior quality and comfort. The Manduka PROlite yoga mat is a lighter, 100% latex free mat for in the yoga studio and on the go.
• high performance in a lightweight form • superior wear and longevity backed by a Lifetime Guarantee • closed-cell surface to keep moisture and sweat from seeping into the mat and breeding bacteria and proprietary dot pattern bottom to resist sliding• fabric-like surface finish for optimal movement between poses• sustainable engineering ensures high quality material will not peel, flake or fade. Product improves with use over time 
To Store: Roll Manduka PROlite yoga mats with the top side (fabric-finish) facing outwards. This keeps the corners of the mat flat when practising.
To Break In: The surface texture of PROlite yoga mats improves with use. Our customers have found that the best way to “break in” their yoga mat is to use it on a daily basis. Another trick is to sprinkle coarse sea salt over your mat, use a light spritz of water, and scrub it down with a stiff brush before allowing to air dry in the sunshine.

name: Manduka PROlite Yoga Mat - Long
description:
This mat is the longer version of the Manduka PROlite yoga mat, the perfect solution for people seeking a lightweight yoga mat with superior quality and comfort. The Manduka PROlite yoga mat is a lighter, 100% latex free mat for in the yoga studio and on the go.
• high performance in a lightweight form • superior wear and longevity backed by a Lifetime Guarantee • closed-cell surface to keep moisture and sweat from seeping into the mat and breeding bacteria and proprietary dot pattern bottom to resist sliding• fabric-like surface finish for optimal movement between poses• sustainable engineering ensures high quality material will not peel, flake or fade. Product improves with use over time 
 
To Store: Roll Manduka PROlite yoga mats with the top side (fabric-finish) facing outwards. This keeps the corners of the mat flat when practising.
To Break In: The surface texture of PROlite yoga mats improves with use. Our customers have found that the best way to “break in” their yoga mat is to use it on a daily basis. Another trick is to sprinkle coarse sea salt over your mat, use a light spritz of water, and scrub it down with a stiff brush before allowing to air dry in the sunshine.

name: Manduka PRO Yoga Mat
description:
The best-selling Manduka PRO yoga mat is luxuriously dense for unparalleled comfort and cushioning. With a lifetime guarantee, the Manduka PRO Mat will revolutionise your practice for years to come.
• closed-cell surface to keep moisture and sweat from seeping into the mat and breeding bacteria and proprietary dot pattern bottom to resist sliding• high-density cushion for unparalleled experience, joint protection, and versatility on any surface (carpet, cement, hardwood floors) • fabric-like surface finish for optimal movement between poses • sustainable engineering ensures high quality material will not peel, flake or fade • designed to last a lifetime (or two), Manduka PRO series yoga mats are 100% latex free and curb the amount of PVC mats that enter landfills every year 
To Store: Roll Manduka PRO mats with the top side (fabric-finish) facing outwards. This keeps the corners of the mat flat when practising.
To Break In: The surface texture of Manduka PRO mats improves with use. The best way to break in your mat is practise, practise, practise, but if you want to speed things up a little, try a simple salt scrub, or cleaning your mat thoroughly before and after every practice with a non-scratch sponge and a mat wash (or a homemade mixture of organic detergent and water).

name: Manduka PRO Yoga Mat - Long
description:
This extra long Manduka PRO yoga mat is luxuriously dense for unparalleled comfort and cushioning. With a lifetime guarantee, the Manduka PRO Mat will revolutionise your practice for years to come.
• closed-cell surface to keep moisture and sweat from seeping into the mat and breeding bacteria and proprietary dot pattern bottom to resist sliding• high-density cushion for unparalleled experience, joint protection, and versatility on any surface (carpet, cement, hardwood floors) • fabric-like surface finish for optimal movement between poses • sustainable engineering ensures high quality material will not peel, flake or fade • designed to last a lifetime (or two), Manduka PRO series yoga mats are 100% latex free and curb the amount of PVC mats that enter landfills every year 
 
To Store: Roll Manduka PRO mats with the top side (fabric-finish) facing outwards. This keeps the corners of the mat flat when practising.
To Break In: The surface texture of Manduka PRO mats improves with use. The best way to break in your mat is practise, practise, practise, but if you want to speed things up a little, try a simple salt scrub, or cleaning your mat thoroughly before and after every practice with a non-scratch sponge and a mat wash (or a homemade mixture of organic detergent and water).

name: Manduka Pro Travel Mat 2mm
description:
The surface and density of your favorite Manduka PRO™ mat, but easy to take on the go.
At 50% lighter than your PRO and 2mm thick, it's easier to take a mat on your next retreat or anywhere your adventures take you. Now you can have the density, performance and durability you know and love from your PRO mat everywhere you go. This mat also has the ability to be folded without leaving permanent creases.

Standard: 1.1kg; 180cm x 61cm; 2mm thick
Same dense support as the Manduka PRO™ & PROlite®, but a thinner, travel-friendly version
Hygienic closed-cell surface keeps moisture and bacteria at bay, increasing longevity and making post-practice cleanup simple
High-density cushion for unparalleled experience, joint protection, and versatility on most surfaces
Proprietary dot pattern holds the mat in place on the floor
Professional medium grip, as preferred by teachers, allows you to flow between postures without sticking to the mat

The grip of the PRO Series improve with use. The best way to break in your mat is practice, practice, practice

Emissions-free manufacturing

100% latex free

Standard 100 by OEKO-TEX® certified

name: Manduka eKO Lite 3.0 4mm Yoga Mat
description:
Built sustainably for the mindful yogi, the updated Manduka eKO® lite 4mm yoga mat provides an improved Catch-Grip™ surface texture for traction in wet and dry conditions, combined with Responsive Ride™ layer for a cushioned, springy ride. Sustainably manufactured from recycled non-Amazon harvested tree rubber, the eKO lite supports both your practice and our planet.
All Manduka eKO® Series yoga mats have a closed-cell surface, which will never absorb moisture. Because of this, if you are warm or sweaty, the yoga mat will feel slippery, so we always recommend pairing it with a hand towel to absorb moisture and provide extra traction or to apply Yoga Grip Gel during your practice. If you're practicing hot yoga, we recommend a mat towel for full mat coverage.

name: Manduka eKO Superlite Travel Mat
description:
The Manduka eKO® SuperLite yoga mat is a superior lightweight yoga mat that provides excellent grip while being thin enough to fold and pack easy for traveling. Wherever your practice takes you, the eKO® SuperLite is the best yoga mat for yogis on the go!

Fold + go for ultimate portability
Easily put it on top of a studio's mat for your own personal surface and extra grip
Made with a unique closed-cell top surface which prevents moisture from entering the mat, keeping it clean and in good condition longer than other natural rubber mats
Tightly woven scrim resists tearing or stretching
Made from biodegradable, non-Amazon harvested, natural tree rubber with non-toxic foaming agents and non-AZO dyes
Due to their biodegradable nature, the eKO® Series is not recommended for a daily vigorous practice
Usage of the eKO® Series in a hot environment requires regular care to maintain the performance of the rubber
99% Latex-free. Not recommended for those with Latex sensitivities
No PVC
No harmful plasticizers

name: ecoYoga Jute Mat
description:
The ecoYoga biodegradable yoga mat is both practical and ethical for beginners and experienced students alike. With a pure rubber underside for a firm grip on the floor, this eco-friendly yoga mat boasts a surface layer blend of natural hessian/jute fabric and a unique 100% natural rubber compound which provides an excellent non slip surface for your yoga practice.

made in the UK
sustainable plant-based materials
suitable for vegans
100% natural rubber (contains latex)
biodegradable
excellent grip / non-slip

Please note that the weave of the jute is such that some loose threads and nubs are normal. There is also a 10% allowance on the jute exposure as 100% natural raw materials will not always be 100% consistent. Due to the nature of the materials, if the mat is subject to very heavy use, it may degrade quicker than some other less eco-friendly mats. Colours can have slight variations. Also, 100% natural rubber has a tendency to bloom which can appear on the surface as a mild dusty coating - it can be wiped off with water.

name: Jade Yoga Harmony Mat - 173cm
description:
The Jade Yoga Harmony Mat is everything you want in a yoga mat - cool colours, incredible grip, great comfort and eco-friendly. The Harmony yoga mat provides a great traction and cushioning while still providing stability for standing poses.

sustainably made with natural rubber tapped from rubber trees, a renewable resource
Regular length 173cm x width 61cm
does not contain PVC, EVA or other synthetic rubber
made in the United States in compliance with all US environmental, labour and consumer protection laws
comes in a variety of fun and soothing colours
Jade Yoga plants a tree for every mat sold - with over 2 million trees planted so far

 Although Jade mats are 99% latex free, as they are from rubber trees, there may be trace amounts of latex proteins in the mats so we recommend people with latex allergies avoid contact with these mats.
Do not leave exposed to direct sunlight.

name: Jade Yoga Harmony Mat - 188cm
description:
The Jade Yoga Harmony Mat is everything you want in a yoga mat - cool colours, incredible grip, great comfort and eco-friendly. The Harmony yoga mat provides a great traction and cushioning while still providing stability for standing poses.

sustainably made with natural rubber tapped from rubber trees, a renewable resource
Longer length188cm x 61cm wide
does not contain PVC, EVA or other synthetic rubber
made in the United States in compliance with all US environmental, labour and consumer protection laws
can be used on both sides
comes in a variety of colours
Jade Yoga plants a tree for every mat sold - with over 2 million trees planted so far

Although Jade mats are 99% latex free, as they are from rubber trees, there may be trace amounts of latex proteins in the mats so we recommend people with latex allergies avoid contact with these mats.
Do not leave exposed to direct sunlight.

name: Jade Yoga Travel Mat
description:
The Jade Yoga Travel Mat is the thinner and therefore lighter version of the fantastic Jade Yoga natural rubber yoga mat. This eco-friendly travel yoga mat is ideal for yogis on the go and for those who like closer contact with the ground.

folds up to fit easily into your luggage
weighs less than 1.5kg
available in a range of cool colours
made sustainably with natural rubber tapped from rubber trees
Jade Yoga plants a tree for every mat sold - with over 940,000 trees planted so far

Although Jade mats are 99% latex free, as they are from rubber trees, there may be trace amounts of latex proteins in the mats so we recommend people with latex allergies avoid contact with these mats.
Do not leave exposed to direct sunlight.

name: Jade Yoga Voyager Mat
description:
The Jade Voyager Mat is the most portable mat that Jade Yoga offers, made specifically to go with you everywhere and anywhere. This extra thin yoga mat folds up to about the size of a yoga block, allowing it to fit perfectly into your suitcase or backpack. The Jade Yoga Voyager Mat has only one side, the other "net"-side is used for stability and grip to the floor. 

the best choice if you have a limited amount of storage space or will be using it over another mat
great grip - open cell natural rubber provides optimum grip
comfortable - natural rubber has more resilience and cushion
eco-Friendly - made in the US with natural rubber, a renewable resource and contains no synthetic plastics.
through its partnership with Trees for the Future, JadeYoga plants a Tree with every mat sold

While the Voyager is ideal for those that have to travel light and/or have limited storage space, it is not the best option for daily usage, as its portability impacts overall durability. Creases are a natural consequence of folding the Jade Yoga Voyager Mat - effects will be minimised by keeping your mat rolled when not travelling. Please note that the reinforcing scrim which is hidden inside the other Jade mats is visible on the bottom of the Voyager mat.
Although Jade mats are 99% latex free, as they are from rubber trees, there may be trace amounts of latex proteins in the mats so we recommend persons with latex allergies avoid contact with these mats.
Do not leave exposed to direct sunlight.

name: Yoga Design Lab Studio Mat 3.5mm - Zenith
description:
This premium eco-friendly yoga mat/towel combination from Yoga Design Lab was designed to be the ultimate yoga companion.
Ideal for hot yoga, any dynamic sweaty practice, Pilates and general exercise, these Yoga Design Lab Studio Mats come in a range of stylish and distinctive designs for you to choose from. Luxurious and absorbent sueded microfibre (made of recycled plastic bottles) bonded to a natural tree rubber base gives you the wet grip of a towel (that grips better the more you sweat) with the cushion of a yoga mat and a responsive grip to reduce injuries. You'll no longer need to bring a mat and towel to yoga class anymore!

no towel bunching or moving around during your class
eco-friendly - biodegradable, recyclable, 100% natural tree rubber
water-based inks free from silicone, toxic glue, and phthalates
comes with durable carrying strap

At the beginning of your practice, lightly spraying water on the top surface of the mat will prevent sliding if you have dry hands and feet.

name: Yoga Design Lab Studio Mat 3.5mm - Aegean Green
description:
This premium eco-friendly yoga mat/towel combination from Yoga Design Lab was designed to be the ultimate yoga companion.
Ideal for hot yoga, any dynamic sweaty practice, Pilates and general exercise, these Yoga Design Lab Studio Mats come in a range of stylish and distinctive designs for you to choose from. Luxurious and absorbent sueded microfibre (made of recycled plastic bottles) bonded to a natural tree rubber base gives you the wet grip of a towel (that grips better the more you sweat) with the cushion of a yoga mat and a responsive grip to reduce injuries. You'll no longer need to bring a mat and towel to yoga class anymore!

no towel bunching or moving around during your class
eco-friendly - biodegradable, recyclable, 100% natural tree rubber
water-based inks free from silicone, toxic glue, and phthalates
comes with durable carrying strap 

At the beginning of your practice, lightly spraying water on the top surface of the mat will prevent sliding if you have dry hands and feet

name: Yoga Design Lab Infinity Mat 5mm - Diamond Align Coral
description:
This Yoga Design Lab Infinity studio quality pro mat blends high performance luxury with a geometric diamond pattern to assist with the alignment of your poses and provide an unmatched grip.

Ideal for all yoga and fitness practices, with just the right amount of cushion.
Anti-slip yoga, Pilates, or general fitness mat with wet or dry grip

5mm of natural tree rubber to cushion your spine and knees
Open-cell PU top layer offers incredible grip and quick moisture absorption

Suitable for beginner, intermediate or advanced practice
Odour free

Durable carrying strap included

name: Yoga Design Lab Infinity Mat 5mm - Mandala Charcoal
description:
This Yoga Design Lab Infinity studio quality pro mat blends high performance luxury with a sleek textured symmetrical design to assist with the alignment of your poses and provide an unmatched grip.

Ideal for all yoga and fitness practices, with just the right amount of cushion.
Anti-slip yoga, Pilates, or general fitness mat with wet or dry grip
Soft to the touch, textured pattern assists alignment
5mm of natural tree rubber to cushion your spine and knees
Quick drying
Suitable for beginner, intermediate or advanced practice
Odour free
$1 from every purchase goes to support Urban Youth Yoga Programs in need
Durable carrying strap included

name: Yoga Design Lab Studio Mat 3.5mm- Rose
description:
This premium eco-friendly yoga mat/towel combination from Yoga Design Lab was designed to be the ultimate yoga companion.
Ideal for hot yoga, any dynamic sweaty practice, Pilates and general exercise, these Yoga Design Lab Studio Mats come in a range of stylish and distinctive designs for you to choose from. Luxurious and absorbent sueded microfibre (made of recycled plastic bottles) bonded to a natural tree rubber base gives you the wet grip of a towel (that grips better the more you sweat) with the cushion of a yoga mat and a responsive grip to reduce injuries. You'll no longer need to bring a mat and towel to yoga class anymore!

name: Yoga Design Lab Studio Mat 3.5mm - Mandala Black
description:
This premium eco-friendly yoga mat/towel combination from the Yoga Design Lab was designed to be the ultimate yoga companion. Ideal for hot yoga, any dynamic sweaty practice, Pilates and general exercise, these Yoga Design Lab Studio Mats come in a range of stylish and distinctive designs for you to choose from.

luxurious and absorbent sueded microfibre (made of recycled plastic bottles) bonded to a natural tree rubber base gives you the wet grip of a towel (that grips better the more you sweat), the cushion of a yoga mat and a responsive grip to reduce injuries
no towel bunching or moving around during your class
eco-friendly - biodegradable, recyclable, 100% natural tree rubber, water-based inks
free from silicone, toxic glue, and phthalates
comes with durable carrying strap

You'll no longer need to bring a mat and towel to yoga class anymore! At the beginning of your practice, lightly spraying water on the top surface of the mat will prevent sliding if you have dry hands and feet

name: Yoga Design Lab Studio Mat 3.5mm - Mandala Turquoise
description:
This premium eco-friendly yoga mat/towel combination from the Yoga Design Lab was designed to be the ultimate yoga companion. Ideal for hot yoga, any dynamic sweaty practice, Pilates and general exercise, these Yoga Design Lab Studio Mats come in a range of stylish and distinctive designs for you to choose from.

luxurious and absorbent sueded microfibre (made of recycled plastic bottles) bonded to a natural tree rubber base gives you the wet grip of a towel (that grips better the more you sweat), the cushion of a yoga mat and a responsive grip to reduce injuries
no towel bunching or moving around during your class
eco-friendly - biodegradable, recyclable, 100% natural tree rubber, water-based inks
free from silicone, toxic glue, and phthalates
comes with durable carrying strap

You'll no longer need to bring a mat and towel to yoga class anymore! At the beginning of your practice, lightly spraying water on the top surface of the mat will prevent sliding if you have dry hands and feet

name: Yoga Design Lab Cork Mat 3.5mm - Natural Balance
description:
The Cork Yoga Mat is the most sustainable choice within yoga mats.
Cork is lightweight, allowing for more efficient shipping to the factory. The yoga mat cork is supported by a base of natural non-slip rubber from Vietnam. Only water-based inks are used for the prints, leaving you with a fully sustainable and beautiful piece of art. Cork is antimicrobial, meaning you don’t need harmful chemicals to clean your collection. Organic soap and water are sufficient and if you get any major stains, you can actually file down the cork a bit and avoid cleaners altogether!

Designed to love the earth and your practice
Non-slip grip that improves with sweat
High-density cushion for support
Durable: Premium quality for the most rigorous studio conditions or at home
Eco-friendly: biodegradable natural cork and rubber with water-based inks
Free from silicone, pvc, and phthalates
Easy to Clean: antimicrobial cork
Includes carrying strap


Cork trees grow around the Mediterranean naturally and on farms. The mat cork is sourced and certified from tree farms in Portugal. The bark of the cork tree can be harvested every 9-10 years during its 200-year life span. The tree is not harmed during the process; it actually allows for greater absorption of CO2 while the bark regrows.
If a tree does reach its end life, two new saplings are planted in its place thus ensuring the cork forest continues to flourish and renew. The harvested cork bark is shredded to a pulp and pressed into long sheets to be used in products. Any leftover cork dust is used to fuel the mills.
If you no longer need your products, cork is compostable. Better yet, you can find a local agency to upcycle your cork or find DIY inspiration online to upcycle your cork.

name: Yoga Design Lab Studio Mat 3.5mm - Breathe
description:

Ideal for hot yoga, any dynamic sweaty practice, Pilates and general exercise, these Yoga Design Lab Studio Mats come in a range of stylish and distinctive designs for you to choose from. Luxurious and absorbent sueded microfibre (made of recycled plastic bottles) bonded to a natural tree rubber base gives you the wet grip of a towel (that grips better the more you sweat) with the cushion of a yoga mat and a responsive grip to reduce injuries. You'll no longer need to bring a mat and towel to yoga class anymore!

no towel bunching or moving around during your class
eco-friendly - biodegradable, recyclable, 100% natural tree rubber
water-based inks free from silicone, toxic glue, and phthalates
comes with durable carrying strap 

At the beginning of your practice, lightly spraying water on the top surface of the mat will prevent sliding if you have dry hands and feet.

name: Yoga Design Lab Travel Mat 1.5mm- Zenith
description:
For those of you who like to sweat - this is your yoga mat! An eco-friendly, ultra-absorbent microfibre top layer is bonded to a natural rubber base layer to provide the ultimate in sweat management and stability. This mat is actually "moisture activated," and gets grippier the wetter it gets.
Say goodbye to towel bunching forever with this ultimate 2-in-1 combination. The foldable,1.5mm thickness is ideal for travel or easy transport.
For optimal grip, lightly spritz your mat with water before practice. Sweat will also help you adhere to the mat.

Recycled PET microfiber top layer is made using 15 plastic bottles
Base layer is made with sustainable, non-Amazonian natural tree rubber
Printed with water-based inks
Phthalate, silicone and toxin-fee.

description:
Designed as the ultimate on-the-go yogi companion, this travel mat is the lightweight version of the premium eco-friendly yoga mat/towel combination from the Yoga Design Lab. Ideal for hot yoga or any dynamic sweaty practice, Pilates and general exercise - on its own or over a studio mat.

lightweight and folds into compact travel-friendly form
reversible 
luxurious and absorbent sueded microfibre (made of recycled plastic bottles) bonded to a natural tree rubber base gives you the wet grip of a towel (that grips better the more you sweat) and a responsive grip to reduce injuries

name: Yogamatters Signature Studio Yoga Mat - Long - Box of 7
description:
Box of 7
Engineered for performance, the Yogamatters Signature Studio Yoga Mat - Long with its unrivalled grip, incredible durability and easy to clean closed cell structure, makes this our top pick for yoga studios.
At 5.5mm thick, the ‘Studio’ mat is the perfect yoga mat for yoga studios, providing just the right amount of cushioning and comfort without compromising stability in your yoga pose. 
Designed to be reversible to accommodate different styles of yoga.  The smooth side is perfect for a gentle Hatha, Restorative or Yin practice and the dotted side provides a stable grip for a dynamic practice making it a versatile option for a yoga studio. 
Our Studio Yoga Mat has a standard option at 183cm length, also available as a wholesale box of 9 yoga mats - ideal for yoga studios. Please have a look at our other colour matching props here.

Made in Germany
5.5mm thickness to protect knees and joints
Unrivalled dry grip from first use, no need to wear in
The closed cell structure prevents sweat, dirt and bacteria from penetrating the mat
Extremely durable and long lasting 
Reversible feature to suit your practice
Plastic-free packaging
Oeko-Tex® Standard 100 Certification*
Suitable for eyeletting which is an additional service on top of the cost of the mat, hang the mat on a wall bracket - ideal for studios!

* An international testing and certification system for textiles, limiting the use of certain chemicals which may be considered harmful for people and planet. Free of AZO, DOP, Phthalates, Latex, Bisphenol-A (BPA), Lead and Dioxins.
Yogamatters offers a generous discount on products that are bought wholesale. We are unable to amend the quantity pack size or mix colours if this is not an option. If you decide to return an item, you must return the full pack.

name: Yogamatters Organic Cotton Restorative Yoga Mat
description:
Introducing our new Restorative Yoga Mat, still the waves of your mind and go deeper into Savasana. Designed for a restorative yoga practice and gong baths, fall into deep relaxation and support your yoga nidra practice with this cocooning meditation prop to relieve stress and anxiety. 
Made from sustainable materials with plentiful cushioning for comfort and warmth. Perfect for your home sanctuary but it also comes with a practical carry handle so you can take your mat to your restorative yoga class too. 

Outer mat cover made from 100% organically grown cotton  and filled with recycled polyester fibrefill
Removable and machine washable cover
Rolls up for easy storage 
Practical carry handle 
Doubles as a spare mattress or even as a yoga bolster
Thoughtfully produced in India with a long-term Yogamatters partner
Compostable packaging

Shop the Yogamatters Organic Cotton Collection here.
Shop the Yogamatters Yoga Nidra Kit here.

name: Manduka Shala Yoga Rug
description:
A sustainable yoga rug crafted by hand for your outdoor practices and easy flows.
Mindfully made from pre-consumer apparel scraps, the Shala Yoga Rug pays homage to early yogic traditions while also supporting the craftsmanship of artisan weavers. The intricate weave provides support and cushion for your restorative and meditation practice.

Hand loomed by a community of artisan weavers in India
Naturally supportive
Made with 95% recycled cotton from pre-consumer waste and 5% poly
Machine washable for easy cleaning
Weight: 1.1 kg
Dimensions: 180 cm x 66 cm

name: Jade Yoga Organic Cotton Mysore Yoga Rug
description:
Back to the roots - With Jade's organic cotton Mysore yoga rugs you can feel closer to the traditional roots of Yoga. They're perfect for all kinds of yoga, including Ashtanga, outdoor classes, and beach yoga. 
Jade`s Mysore rugs are handwoven by rural artisans in India, preserving a tradition and art form and providing a livelihood for weavers. Weaving is a traditional way of life for many people in this region, which has experienced an enormous decline in recent years due to increasing industrialization. These rugs support the traditional weavers and enable them to use their skills to support their families as well as to keep this tradition alive.
They are made with organic cotton and all natural vegetable dyes made from herbs including indigo, cumin and turmeric. The herbal dyes are specially made in small batches in order to get the most color and benefits from the herbs.
These rugs are lightweight at only 1.13kg and can easily be taken outdoors to the park or the beach. They are also machine washable with cold water, making them easy to care for. (note that rugs may shrink slightly in the wash). Wash colours separately and hang to air dry (will shrink if put in a dryer).
When using on hard surfaces such as hardwood, laminate and tile floors, please use on top of your Jade mat (natural rubber mats) or other non-slip underlay to prevent slipping.
With the purchase of each rug, Jade provides a week of hot lunches to a child in need in India.
Measurements:Thickness: 1/8" (3mm)Width: 27" (68.6cm)Length: 72" (183cm)Weight: 1.1kg

name: Manduka PRO Extra Long and Wide Yoga Mat -  Black
description:
Explore your very own at-home yoga sanctuary!
Don't have a dedicated workout room or yoga space? The PRO Long & Wide can transform your living room into a home studio with minimal effort.
Your platforms for play:

Practice inversions and transitions with ease
Room for all your props, so you can truly unwind in restorative poses
No distractions - just the right size to keep your practice ON the mat
Versatile for any barefoot workout mat – from Burpee to Savasana

All PRO Series mats have a closed-cell surface, which will never absorb moisture. Because of this, if you are warm/sweaty at all, the mat will feel slippery, so we always recommend pairing it with one of our hand towels to absorb moisture and provide extra traction. If you're practicing hot yoga, we recommend a mat towel for full mat coverage.

name: Yogamatters Sticky Yoga Mat - Box of 12
description:
The Yogamatters sticky yoga mat is the best value non-slip yoga mat in town - hence why you see this mat in yoga studios everywhere. The sticky mats in this box of 12 are all one colour, so all you have to do is select one of the fabulous colours on offer to create the studio space of your choice. Please have a closer look at the colours here and matching props here.

a standard sized yoga mat with plenty of space and grip for your practice
wears in to develop excellent grip to help your hands and feet stay static and slip free
cushioned enough to protect knees, bottoms and backs from hard surfaces below
not so dense that you can't feel the floor beneath you to help hold steady in balances
available in a rainbow of eye-catching colours to match with other yoga accessories in the Yogamatters range
Standard 100 by OEKO-TEX® certified

We recommend cleaning the mat before use. The more the mat is used and worn in, the grippier it'll become.

name: Yogamatters Eco Rise Yoga Mat - Box of 6
description:
Box of 6
Our top pick for an eco-friendly yoga mat with a stylish flair, the Yogamatters Eco Rise Yoga Mat, is made from natural materials and comes in a selection of soft colours. The unique cotton-blend mesh surface gives the ‘Eco Rise’ superior grip & durability.
Made from natural tree rubber which has been sustainably harvested, our earth-friendly yoga mat is the ideal place to start your day. 
Designed to match perfectly with props from the Organic Cotton Yoga Collection. 

Made from sustainably harvested natural tree rubber
Biodegradable
Free from toxic chemicals and dyes
Fresh and natural colours
Cotton blend mesh surface for strong grip
3mm thickness gives moderate cushioning. For more cushioning see Eco Everyday Yoga Mat

The Eco Everyday Rise Yoga Mat  initially has a strong rubber smell, this smell will fade over a short period of time.  
Due to the natural properties of this product, the colour may change a little over time.  
This product is not suitable for people with a rubber allergy (99% latex free)

name: Yogamatters Eco Everyday Yoga Mat - Box of 6
description:
Box of 6
Our best-selling eco-friendly yoga mat, the ‘Eco Everyday’ is made from natural tree rubber which has been sustainably harvested. Designed with a wave-like textured surface for unrivalled grip and cushioned to give comfort to knees and joints, our ‘Eco Everyday’ is the perfect yoga mat for your daily practice. 

Made from sustainably harvested natural tree rubber and recycled materials certified by Recycled Claim Standard (RCS), an innovative solution to environmental waste
Biodegradable
4mm thickness offering support and cushioning for knees and joints
A textured practice surface for superior grip 
Free from toxic chemicals and dyes

Due to the natural properties of this product, the colour of this mat may change a little over time.  The mat initially has a strong rubber smell, this smell will fade over a short period of time.  Store your mat rolled up. Do not leave exposed to direct sunlight or roll mat when still wet. Do not machine wash, submerge in water or use any soap or other chemicals to clean.
As this mat is made from natural rubber 99% latex free, this product is not suitable for anyone with a rubber allergy.
Yogamatters offers a generous discount on products that are bought wholesale. We are unable to amend the quantity pack size or mix colours if this is not an option. If you decide to return an item, you must return the full pack.

Box of 12 mats

Made from eco-friendly materials which have been sustainably harvested and engineered to have a non-slip surface, use the ‘Eco Travel’ on its own or as a hygienic layer on top of a studio mat.
Each mat is different with it’s own unique marbled design. 

Made from sustainably harvested natural tree rubber which offers superior grip
Biodegradable
Free from toxic chemicals and dyes
Super light at 750 grams 
Ultra thin at 1mm
Easily foldable 
Unique marbled design

Check out the Yogamatters Travel Kit, including the Eco Travel Yoga Mat

name: Yogamatters Ultra Lightweight Exercise Mat - Black - Box of 6
description:
Box of 6
The Yogamatters Ultra Lightweight Mat is a lightweight multi-functional exercise mat that will take you from the gym to yoga and everywhere in between.  
Made from complete NBR foam and post-production materials,  the Ultra Lightweight is cushioned, lightweight and functional. And at 10mm thick, provides a soft but stable base to work out from and with a textured finish enhances grip in dry and wet conditions.
The Ultra is made with a closed cell structure and contains an antibacterial formula both components stopping bacteria from growing or odours developing. Finished with bevelled edges which blend into the floor so movement can seamlessly extend beyond the body of the mat.

A multipurpose mat
Closed cell structure
Contains a hygienic antibacterial formula
Contains post-production materials
Softly cushioned
Lightweight
